<h1 style="text-align: center; font-size: 36px;">Hello, I'm Jiye Choi.</h1>
<br><br>

<h2 style="font-size: 28px; text-align: left;">🎓 Background:</h2>
<p style="font-size: 18px;">I have a strong foundation in data analysis and statistical modeling, with hands-on experience from multiple projects during my undergraduate studies in Information and Statistics at Gyeongsang National University (Feb 2019).</p>
<br><br>

<h2 style="font-size: 28px; text-align: left; margin-bottom: 20px;">👩‍💻 Key Projects:</h2>
<ul style="font-size: 18px; list-style-type: disc;">
  <li style="margin-bottom: 20px; margin-top: 10px;"><strong>Bank Customer Analysis:</strong> <em>SAS</em> | Identified that customers with savings accounts were 1.02x more likely to hold checking accounts, leading to targeted cross-selling strategies and improved customer engagement by up to 15%.</li>
  <li style="margin-bottom: 20px;"><strong>Birth Rate Disparities:</strong> <em>PCA, Factor Analysis</em> | Revealed that urban development and access to childcare and education explained 80% of birth rate variance, offering actionable insights for improving birth rates in underdeveloped areas.</li>
  <li style="margin-bottom: 20px;"><strong>Facebook “National Geographic” Analysis:</strong> <em>Text mining, LDA in R, on Linux</em> | Analyzed 2,000+ posts, uncovering key engagement themes such as wildlife and photography, providing insights to optimize content strategy and increase audience interaction.</li>
</ul>
<br><br>
